paper_abstract: Online analytical processing (OLAP) queries normally incur enormous processing overheads due to the huge size of data warehouses. This results in unacceptable response times. Parallel processing using a cluster of workstations has of late emerged as a practical solution to many compute and data intensive problems. In this article, we present parallel algorithms for some of the OLAP operators. We have implemented these parallel solutions for a data warehouse implemented on Oracle hosted in a cluster of workstations. Our performance studies show that encouraging speedups are achieved.
paper_title: Parallel processing of olap queries using a cluster of workstations
